channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Podcast: The worst market calls of 2024, and the path for AI in 2025
Mastercard credits apparel and restaurants as U.S. holiday spending climbs 3.8%
Trump is set to hike tariffs. Should Southeast Asia be worried?
item.description: Countries like Vietnam benefited from Trump's trade war. That could put them at risk in the second round.

item.title: Tourism has become a dirty word. But 2025 could be the year vacationers stop being the villains, experts predict
item.description: Tourism became a harbinger of problems this year—it was long in the making. 2025 could "mark a new dawn" for the industry.

item.title: These CEO’s reveal their top festive reads for the year
item.description: Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a seasoned C-suite executive or someone simply interested in the craft of leadership, these books are valuabl...

item.title: How McDonald’s has kept Europeans hooked by fusing an American fast-food staple with local delicacies
item.description: Given its place in U.S. culture, McDonald’s European success might surprise some. But it's a product of the giant's deliberately curated local menus.

item.title: U.S. stocks end mixed after Christmas break
Why 2025 looks like a great year to retire
Manmohan Singh, former Indian prime minister known as ‘Mr Clean,’ dies aged 92
item.description: Born in 1932 in what is now Pakistan, Singh never held elected office before taking the vast nation's top job.

item.title: Palantir shares are set to fall 10%, according to one analyst. And he’s bullish.
